Texts.Chs: 在你学习科技之前，恰恰拉要确保你知道科技是如何工作的。^green;去完成^green;恰恰拉做的^reset;^orange;测试路径^reset;，之后^orange;隐形科技^reset;就永远是你的了！
Texts.Eng: Before you get tech, Chacharra make sure you know how tech works. ^green;Go to ^orange;testing course ^green;Chacharra made^reset;, then ^orange;Stealth Tech ^reset;yours forever!

Texts.Chs: 恰恰拉印象深刻，你很熟练！你拿好^orange;隐形科技^reset;，用它去偷袭其他的敌人...
Texts.Eng: Chacharra impressed, you skilled! You keep ^orange;Stealth Tech^reset;, use to sneak past many enemies...

Texts.Chs: 完成^orange;隐形科技测试路径^reset;
与^orange;恰恰拉^reset;交谈以进入^orange;测试路径^reset;
Texts.Eng: Talk to ^orange;Chacharra^reset; to enter the ^orange;testing course^reset;
